channel.title: Help with saving
channel.description:
I keep saving stuff on testscape like on my characters file - I make my player have rights and a few others and i edit their skills and banks and etc.. then save then compile.. well it never works when i get in the server...
Also while im posting when i run compile i get 'Compiler' is not recognized as an eternal or external program the system cannot find the path specified x2 then Starts up.. is this a problem i should try to fix or what?

item.title: Help with saving
item.dc:creator: @Satan_Dragon Satan Dragon
item.description:
@Satan_Dragon wrote:

i have my classpath and that setup i did that already but yea it still says that[br][size=1]Posted at: August 19, 2006, 11:09:37 PM[/size][hr]it wont save my admin… iv done it like mad times it just resets it self… idunno why please somehelp

Read full topic

item.title: Help with saving
item.dc:creator: @PussyCrunch PussyCrunch
item.description:
@PussyCrunch wrote:

No, don’t ignore it. If you want to be able to change stuff on your server, you have to fix it, not ignore it. You have to set up your classpath and path, and you need JDK 5.0 update 7 and JRE.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with saving
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

Ignore it. If it starts up you’re good.

Read full topic
